# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
| ------- | --------- |
| 0.1.x   | ✅         |
| < 0.1   | ❌         |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly.

- Contact the maintainer directly at `@armandwipangestu`

Please **do not open a public issue** until the vulnerability has been reviewed and resolved.
